title: Measles is coming back as vaccination rates fall. What’s next?
desc: Fewer people are taking their children for the much-needed jabs and experts warn that even more dangerous illnesses could lurking be around the corner

title: Boats, Sea-doos launched to rescue people and animals trapped by flooding near Courtenay
desc: A state of local emergency has been activated and Comox Valley Search and Rescue is launching boats and two Sea-doos in an effort to reach people, dogs and sheep that are trapped amid a flood warning for Dove Creek.

title: Neta V now available for only RM40k, but with a limited 6
desc: Neta V is now cheaper than a Proton Saga MC3 Executive. But would you get an EV with such a short warranty period?

title: Son of Norway crown princess to stand trial for allegedly raping 4 women
desc: Marius Borg Hoiby, the 29-year-old son of Crown Princess Mette-Marit, has been charged with a total of 38 counts.

title: Glasgow's troubled Centre for Contemporary Arts to permanently close
desc: The announcement comes just a year after it secured £3.4m in funding from arts body Creative Scotland.

title: One last ride on the V-set: NSW train fans farewell ‘old but plush’ steel rattlers in style
desc: The beloved train was treated like a visiting superstar on its ‘rowdy but enjoyable’ final journey from Lithgow to Central Station

title: USA Drops Pakistani Fast Bowler From T20 World Cup 2026 Squad

title: Ariana Grande Latest Photoshoot Got Called Out For AI Usage, And Even She Was Shocked
desc: Ariana Grande responded with clear surprise and a swear word to seeing pictures of herself that had seemingly been altered with AI.

title: Driver jailed for murdering Aidan Chapman in Shaftesbury Avenue
desc: Anthony Gilheaney hit four men on Shaftesbury Avenue, killing Aiden Chapman and injuring the others.

title: Amazfit smartwatch users get long-awaited app UI refresh and badge awards
desc: Zepp Health has begun rolling out a notable update to the companion app for its Amazfit watches, introducing a refreshed interface and more.
